title: The Role of the yager support system in increasing Amway distributors motivation
abstract: Much Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) companies recently entered Indonesia and became a trend. Many people are interested in MLM because significant income can be achieved in this business. However, not all people are successful in doing business. This happens because of some factors, one of which is due to motivation. The Yager support system has a significant role in increasing motivation based on Maslow's hierarchy of needs. In this paper, the writer discusses the relationship between The Yager support system and Maslow's Motivation theory. The writer hopes that this paper may benefit the reader, especially the new Amway distributors.
